original_solution_mapping.L1: Mary will inflate a total of 10 balloons/minute x 30 minutes = <<10*30=300>>300 balloons
original_solution_mapping.L2: Jess will inflate a total of 7 balloons/minute x 30 minutes = <<7*30=210>>210 balloons
original_solution_mapping.L3: Christina will inflate a total of 4 balloons/minute x 15 minutes = <<4*15=60>>60 balloons
original_solution_mapping.L4: Combining all balloons, they made 300 balloons + 210 balloons + 60 balloons = <<300+210+60=570>>570 balloons

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5893.
    Returns: the total number of balloons inflated.
    """
    # L1
    mary_rate = 10 # Mary inflates 10 balloons per minute
    total_time = 30 # they only have 30 minutes
    mary_total_balloons = mary_rate * total_time

    # L2
    jess_rate = 7 # Jess inflates 7 balloons per minute
    jess_total_balloons = jess_rate * total_time

    # L3
    christina_rate = 4 # inflating 4 balloons per minute
    christina_late_time = 15 # Christina came 15 minutes late
    christina_total_balloons = christina_rate * christina_late_time

    # L4
    total_balloons = mary_total_balloons + jess_total_balloons + christina_total_balloons

    # FA
    answer = total_balloons
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Mary will inflate a total of {mary_rate} balloons/minute x {total_time} minutes = <<{mary_rate}*{total_time}={mary_total_balloons}>>{mary_total_balloons} balloons
Jess will inflate a total of {jess_rate} balloons/minute x {total_time} minutes = <<{jess_rate}*{total_time}={jess_total_balloons}>>{jess_total_balloons} balloons

Christina will inflate a total of {christina_rate} balloons/minute x {christina_late_time} minutes = <<{christina_rate}*{christina_late_time}={christina_total_balloons}>>{christina_total_balloons} balloons

Combining all balloons, they made {mary_total_balloons} balloons + {jess_total_balloons} balloons + {christina_total_balloons} balloons = <<{mary_total_balloons}+{jess_total_balloons}+{christina_total_balloons}={total_balloons}>>{total_balloons} balloons

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Mary will inflate a total of 10 balloons/minute x 30 minutes = <<10*30=300>>300 balloons
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Jess will inflate a total of 7 balloons/minute x 30 minutes = <<7*30=210>>210 balloons
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Christina will inflate a total of 4 balloons/minute x 15 minutes = <<4*15=60>>60 balloons
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: Combining all balloons, they made 4 balloons + 210 balloons + 60 balloons = <<4+210+60=274>>274 balloons

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'christina_rate' (value: 4) was used instead of 'mary_total_balloons' (value: 300).
